items.name: Chicken Hot & Sour Soup
items.description: Succulent meats and crisp vegetables dance in a bold, zesty broth, creating a symphony of tantalizing tastes

items.name: Chicken Manchow Soup
items.description: A hearty fusion of succulent meats and crisp vegetables in a robust, flavorful broth

items.name: Veg Hot & Sour Soup
items.description: Fresh vegetables harmonized in a zesty broth, delivering the perfect balance of heat and tanginess

items.name: Veg Manchow Soup
items.description: A harmonious blend of fresh vegetables in a flavorful broth, infused with aromatic spices

items.name: Classic Salted Fries
items.description: Crispy golden perfection on the outside, tender and fluffy on the inside, sprinkled with just the right amount of salt

items.name: Peri-Peri Fries
items.description: Crispy, golden fries dusted with a fiery blend of peri-peri spices, delivering a burst of bold flavor in every bite!

items.name: Classic Nachos
items.description: Crispy tortilla chips generously loaded with melted cheese and fresh salsa

items.description: Cubes of paneer delicately spiced with achari (pickle) flavors, char-grilled to perfection

items.description: Succulent chicken pieces bathed in a rich, creamy marinade with hints of aromatic spices

items.name: Chicken Malai Tikka
items.description: Creamy, melt-in-your-mouth chicken infused with aromatic spices and rich malai

items.name: Classic Chicken Tikka (6 Pieces)
items.description: Succulent chicken pieces marinated in a blend of aromatic spices, char-grilled to perfection & served with mint chutney

items.name: Lahsuni Chicken Tikka (6 Pieces)
items.description: Tender chicken pieces marinated in a garlic-infused blend of spices, char-grilled to perfection and served with mint chutney

items.description: Succulent paneer cubes marinated in a vibrant green blend of cilantro, mint, and spices, char-grilled to perfection

items.description: Succulent chicken marinated in traditional Indian spices, char-grilled to perfection, and served with a side of mint chutney

items.description: Plump mushrooms marinated in a rich blend of Indian spices, grilled to perfection, and served with a tantalizing mint chutney

items.description: Succulent paneer cubes wok-tossed with vibrant bell peppers and onions in a spicy, flavorful sauce

items.description: Golden corn kernels seasoned to perfection with a savory blend of salt and pepper, creating a delectable snack that is both satisfying and addictive

items.name: Crispy Babycorn
items.description: Tender baby corn coated in a light, crispy batter, perfectly fried to golden perfection
